Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.motion

Interface Rotatable

All Superinterfaces:
GameNode
All Known Subinterfaces:
ContinuousRotatable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
public interface Rotatable
extends GameNode
Implementing the interface Rotatable will result in de availability of the setRotate(double) method.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RotationBuffer getRotationBuffer()
    Return an instance of RotationBuffer to be used whenever a Node is unavailable to apply the rotation.
    default void setRotate​(double degrees)
    Set the rotation of the YaegerEntity to the specified value.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.GameNode

    getNode

  • Method Details

    • setRotate

      default void setRotate​(double degrees)
      Set the rotation of the YaegerEntity to the specified value. Note that a positive rotation value rotates the YaegerEntity counter clockwise, and a negative value rotates the YaegerEntity clockwise.
      Parameters:
      degrees - The rotation in degrees as a double.

    • getRotationBuffer

      RotationBuffer getRotationBuffer()
      Return an instance of RotationBuffer to be used whenever a Node is unavailable to apply the rotation.
      Returns:
      An instance of RotationBuffer.
